name: Connect Workplace
description:
As friends and coworkers from the same game studio we got inspired to make a game about how we interact in our day to day basis. In this game you have to think about the way coworkers relate, in order to organize them and have a productive day. Some employees traits may affect their neighbors productivity for good (or not).

You can find the source code here: https://github.com/jmontes495/Connect-Workspace
